cluster.name: PM2.5 Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: The server cluster provides an interface to concentration measurement functionality. This cluster SHALL to be used via an alias to a specific substance (see Cluster IDs).

history.description: Cluster redesigned to add support for Level Indication, Peak/Average Measurement, Medium/Unit of Measurement and Uncertainty.

features.name: NumericMeasurement
features.summary: Cluster supports numeric measurement of substance

features.name: LevelIndication
features.summary: Cluster supports basic level indication for substance using the ConcentrationLevel enum

features.name: MediumLevel
features.summary: Cluster supports the Medium Concentration Level

features.name: CriticalLevel
features.summary: Cluster supports the Critical Concentration Level

features.name: PeakMeasurement
features.summary: Cluster supports peak numeric measurement of substance

features.name: AverageMeasurement
features.summary: Cluster supports average numeric measurement of substance

values.name: Air
values.summary: The measurement is being made in Air

values.name: Water
values.summary: The measurement is being made in Water

values.name: Soil
values.summary: The measurement is being made in Soil

attributes.name: MeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the most recent measurement as a single-precision floating-point number. MeasuredValue's unit is represented by MeasurementUnit. A value of null indicates that the measurement is unknown or outside the valid range.

attributes.name: MinMeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the minimum value of MeasuredValue that is capable of being measured. A MinMeasuredValue of null indicates that the MinMeasuredValue is not defined.

attributes.name: MaxMeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the maximum value of MeasuredValue that is capable of being measured. A MaxMeasuredValue of null indicates that the MaxMeasuredValue is not defined.

attributes.name: PeakMeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the maximum value of MeasuredValue that has been measured during the PeakMeasuredValueWindow.

attributes.name: PeakMeasuredValueWindow
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the window of time used for determining the PeakMeasuredValue. The value is in seconds.

attributes.name: AverageMeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the average value of MeasuredValue that has been measured during the AverageMeasuredValueWindow.

attributes.name: AverageMeasuredValueWindow
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the window of time used for determining the AverageMeasuredValue. The value is in seconds.

attributes.name: Uncertainty
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the range of error or deviation that can be found in MeasuredValue and PeakMeasuredValue. This is considered a +/- value and should be considered to be in MeasurementUnit.

attributes.name: MeasurementUnit
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the unit of MeasuredValue.

attributes.name: MeasurementMedium
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the medium in which MeasuredValue is being measured.

attributes.name: LevelValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the level of the substance detected.
